decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FIG 01; 804/RDP/P11 (received 18/05/2012); 804/RDP/P11 A P13 A; P14 A; P15 A; P16 A; P17 A; P18 A P19 A P01-1 A (received 09/08/2012); 804/RDP/P12 B (received 11/04/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, unless otherwise superseded by drawings LSD156/04/005 rev H received on 16 October 2015 and LSD156_04_006 rev M and LSD156/06/030 rev A received on 19 May 2016; LSD156/01/001; Received 25/05/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - Cycle parking shall be implemented on the site in acordance with details contained within the plan LSD156/01/001 submitted 25 May 2016. The approved drawing shall be available for use before first occupation of the development and thereafter maintained and retained as such.
Condition : 3 - Hard and soft landscaping shall be implemented on the site in acordance with details contained within the plan LSD156/01/001 submitted 25 May 2016.

Condition : 4 - All hard and soft landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.  The works shall be carried out prior to the occupation of any part of the development or in accordance with the programme agreed with the local planning authority.

Condition : 5 - The scheme shall be implemented in accordence with the scheme for decontamination approved within application 01054/83-93/P13(3-11,13) on 18 March 2015. During the course of the development:
c.	The Local Planning Authority shall be notified immediately if additional contamination is discovered during the course of the development. A competent person shall assess the additional contamination, and shall submit appropriate amendments to the scheme for decontamination in writing to the Local Planning Authority for approval before any work on that aspect of development continues.  
 	  Before the development is first brought into use:
d.	The agreed scheme for decontamination referred to in clauses b) and c) above, including amendments, shall be fully implemented and a written validation (closure) report submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval.
Condition : 6 - Boundary treatment shall be implemented in accordence with details contained within application 01054/83-93/P13(3i,4,7)  approved on 6 July 2016.

Condition : 7 - The proposal shall be constructed in materials approved within application 01054/83-93/P13(8) on 17 June 2016 unless otherwise superseded by this current application. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
Condition : 8 - Balconies shall be installed on the property in accordance with drawing LSD156/06/030 rev A received on 19 May 2016.
Condition : 9 - The scheme of sound insulation detailed in the acoustic report by KP Acoustics dated 18/09/2012 shall be carried out before any part of the development hereby permitted is occupied.
Condition : 10 - Vehicle charging points shall be provided in accordence with the details approved within application 01054/83-93/P13(11i,12) on 2 June 2016.

Condition : 11 - The proposal shall be implemented in accordance with details contained within the Energy Statement Submitted approved within application 01054/83-93/P13(11i,12) on 2 July 2016. The development shall be completed in accordance with the approved details prior to the occupation of the building and thereafter maintained as such.

Condition : 12 - The scheme shall be implemented in accordance with mitigation measures in terms of impact on television reception approved within application 01054/83-93/P13(3-11,13) on 18 March 2015. The approved mitigation measures shall be completed in accordance with the approved details prior to the occupation of the development.

Condition : 13 - No development, structure or enclosure including those permitted by the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification) in Part 2 Class A shall be carried out along the Staines Road frontage other than any shown by approved drawing LSD156/01/001 without express planning permission first being obtained from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Variation of Condition 2 (Strictly in accordance) and Condition 4 (Hard and soft landscaping plan) of permission 01054/83-93/P13 dated 14.2.2014 for The construction of a fourth and part fifth floor and the conversion of the first, second and third floors from offices (use class B1) to create 27 flats with associated parking and amenity space (existing ground floor offices to be retained)
